The '''Hu Family''', also simply written as the '''Hus''', is a [[Liyue]] clan that founded, and have continued to maintain the [[Wangsheng Funeral Parlor]]. It is currently led by [[Hu Tao]], the 77th-generation director.<ref>{{Ref/CS|Zhongli|Character Details}}</ref><ref>{{Ref/CS|Hu Tao|Character Stories}}</ref>

==Known Members==
*[[Old Hu]] (75th-generation director)
*[[Hu Tao's Father]] (76th-generation director)
*[[Baizhu's Master]] (Old Hu's younger brother and Hu Tao's great-uncle)<ref>{{Ref/Quest|The Search for a Physician}}</ref>
*[[Hu Tao]] (77th-generation director, presumed current head of the Hu Family)
